name: Hollow Knight: Masks of Fate
description:
The Masks of Fate were masterfully crafted by Hallownest's own Mask Maker...but they were too powerful to keep close to the kingdom with the infection still raging below. Thus were they cast out to other lands, sealed away where they would be safe.

Now with the infection gone and Hallownest's sole saviors gone or missing, rumors of the masks being found have begun to surface. New warriors must rise up, wielding Mask Shards bearing the powers of the kingdom's greatest heroes, and protect the other lands from these terrible artifacts.

Will you destroy the Masks of Fate, or wield their unfathomable power and risk them destroying you?

Hollow Knight: Masks of Fate is built in the RUNE System (Beta) designed by DeltaFlashback. This is a test of the system and is subject to potential changes, rebalancing and patches. Please keep this in mind when downloading!

Hollow Knight IP and associated illustrations © Team Cherry

Written and designed by DeltaFlashback

Other illustrations by @Aurora_Barenzu

Made in Homebrewery.
